ComicInfo.Summary:
With Hell now closed for business, the dead are rising all over the world, and this stand-alone issue focuses on one boyâ€™s lone fight against a boarding school full of evil spirits. Features art by fan-favorite illustrator Matt Wagner (Grendel)!
Dream isn't the only one suffering the consequences of Lucifer having closed and locked Hell. Back on earth, the dead with no place else to go are coming back. This isn't great news for young Charles Rowland. With his father taken hostage in Kuwait, he spends one agonizing week alone at boys school with the school's dead. But, with the help of a ghost from the dormitory attic, Charles might just make it.
